cui_name: Histiocytosis with Joint Contractures and Sensorineural Deafness
reasoning: Extremely rare syndromic form of histiocytosis with multi-system involvement including histiocytic infiltration, skeletal abnormalities (joint contractures), and sensorineural hearing loss. Prevalence <0.01 per 100k, likely fewer than 100 cases reported globally. Based on case reports only; no systematic epidemiological studies available.
